item.title: hugo & netlify
item.description: Here is a great tutorial on how to host hugo on netlify Create hugo site In order to create a new hugo site simply go: hugo new site [path] [flags] git Create a new repository on the command line Init the git repo and push it to the guthub repo: echo "# website2" >> README.md git init git add README.md git commit -m "first commit" git remote add origin https://github.
